calcula: Calculate how much your money is worth in real time
necesita: Do you need to know when a coin hits a specific rate? Alerts will let you know when the rate you need is available in the chosen currencies.
alerta-telefono: Now you have this alert saved on your phone

beneficios: What are the benefits of the forex market?
diversificar: Diversify the risk of investments. Protect against a devaluation of the local currency. Access products and solutions in foreign currency. Obtain higher income due to the appreciation of said currency.
suscripcion-info: You can now start diversifying your currency investment
